section.heading: Short title.
section.text: This subchapter may be cited as the Office of Cable Television, Film, Music, and Entertainment Amendment Act of 2015.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Oct. 9, 2002, D.C. Law 14-193, § 2(b), 49 DCR 7334

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: The 2015 amendment by D.C. Law 21-36 substituted “Office of Cable Television, Film, Music, and Entertainment Amendment Act of 2015” for “Cable Television Reform Act of 2002.”

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2072(a) of the Fiscal Year 2016 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2015 (D.C. Act 21-127, July 27, 2015, 62 DCR 10201).
